DOC.criteria: Healthy men woman 21 60 year age recruit participate study . Subjects eligible metabolic , renal , hepatic , hematological laboratory test within normal limit . Subjects exclude study current past history cardiovascular , hepatic , endocrine ( e.g. , diabetes ) , renal , pancreatic , gastrointestinal , pulmonary , immunologic , hematologic , neurologic disease .
